hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated by Ishaq with the same chain uf transmitters except this that the hadith transmitted by Mansur (the above one) is more comprehensive and lengthy

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي الدُّعَاءِ وَالذِّكْرِ فِي آخِرِ اللَّيْلِ وَالإِجَابَةِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to supplicate and recite statements of remembrance at the end of the night, and the response to that
